website_summaries.verdict: While it works quite well as a transitional ramp for wheelchair use, this ramp also addresses other household and business needs, such as moving heavy appliances over thresholds.
pros: Can be installed permanently in threshold
cons: Doesn't work well on uneven floors

customer_reviews.title: Power chair can go across threshold with no problems.
customer_reviews.text: We have a son in a power chair and he has a pin that sticks down from the bottom of his wheelchair that helps him lock into our vehicle. The pin used to rip up our threshold and we ended up replacing it. We used this product and cut out the top to fit perfectly into our threshold. It stays put and works beautifully, my son can go through the doorway with no problems!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cut IF you use a circular saw.  Absorbs the shock so it's smooth ride, not like a speed bump at all, very smooth/luxury!
customer_reviews.text: The easiest way to make your cuts is with a circular saw with a coarse tooth blade. I first tried a reciprocal saw and a multi-tool, but this was impossibly slow. I used a long screw on each far side of this item to secure it to the floor. Being as it is rubber it absorbs a lot of the shock of the wheels riding up on it, so it is a very smooth ride for the wheelchair.
customer_reviews.author: R. Huntington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs for my dad in a wheelchair. We had a 1 1/2 inch step going into the room with his hospital bed and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Great transition mat for door threshold!
customer_reviews.text: The threshold is easy to cut to the right size, and the caregivers/DSP's love not doing wheelies anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ross DeSautel

customer_reviews.title: SafePath Products RAEZ1110 EZEdge 1 1/4" Thick x 42" Wide x 12.25" Transition/Threshold Ramp
customer_reviews.text: GREAT I can get in and out of the home
customer_reviews.author: chevy8

customer_reviews.title: Happy, happy.
customer_reviews.text: Needed something at the back door of the store for deliveries to get the pallets over a lip on the door threshold. This has worked out great and the delivery people just love it. It is very durable and I expect it to last a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase!  Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Such an improvement in ease of entry and exist in the power chair! Great traction!
customer_reviews.author: Gail J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for wheelchair access.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, sturdy and safe threshold ramp that I am sure will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G. Burdeaux

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a smaller one but it didn't work (the return was extremely easy and no hassle)
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I ordered a smaller one but it didn't work (the return was extremely easy and no hassle), this is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Omen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My floor was a bit uneven so it did not work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Rich6973

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution! GREAT quality, great look and easy to customize. I love this ramp.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schrenzel

customer_reviews.title: this mat is amazing..
customer_reviews.text: this mat is amazing...my 14 year old is in a wheelchair and we used to have to pick him up over the lip to come in the door, this fits exactly against the lip and now we just roll him right in...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice ramp
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut and fit in place if necessary. Really does the trick when rolling over with a wheelchair to bridge the threshold going out to the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: We purchased 2 ramps for a delivery platform. The ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 ramps for a delivery platform. The asphalt had shrunk a bit leaving a 1 - 1 1/2" lip from concrete pad. We use a forklift to in and out for deliveries and the ramps work perfectly to eliminate the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Advanced Reprographics

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, exceeded my expectations. Although I felt the shipping charges were expensive. they are located in California and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: WoodRose

customer_reviews.title: works great on wood floors
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our new home with wood flooring. Our daughters power chair drives over and it stays in place. I just wish it came in brown. Would def. recommend
customer_reviews.author: peas mom

customer_reviews.title: great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: This ramp works great for inside thresholds. Heavy duty, stays in place and we did not have to alter it. My father uses this ramp with his electric chair. Great price compared to local health supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

product_meta.title: SafePath Products RAEZ1110 EZEdge 1 1/4" Thick x 42" Wide x 12.25" Transition/Threshold Ramp
product_meta.description: Size:1.25" H x 42" W x 12.25" DSafePath introduced EZEdge Transition/Threshold Ramps more than 20 years ago. They are used to remove vertical barriers in the path of travel...whether it's in the house to solve mobility issues or on the production floor to eliminate tripping hazards. EZEdge ramps are "green" and made from high density, reclaimed rubber from used car and truck tires. These products are both economical and good for the environment. These EZEdge ramps can be used indoors or out and will not fade, crack or deteriorate. They are perfect for wheel chair access through entry way doors, sliding glass doors, patio doors and showers. These ramps are Industrial Grade and can be used in both residential and commercial use. They are noiseless and visually pleasing. All EZEdge ramps are molded with mitered edges on 3 sides. This allows EZ access from any side. EZEdge ramps have no weight limit which means they can handle motorized scooters in the house and lift trucks on the shop floor. Both ADA (Americans with Disabilities Act) and OSHA (Occupational Safety and Health Act) have slip resistant specifications. EZEdge ramps exceed both of these specs and are significantly more slip resistant than ramps made from aluminum, treated lumber or semi-smooth concrete. They will not fade or deteriorate and are guaranteed to resist damage caused by the sun's UV (ultra-violet) rays. All EZEdge products have a 10 year warranty. You should note that EZEdge ramps come in a large variety of sizes. Heights vary from 1/2 inch to 2 inches with widths of 42 to 60 inches. Installation is quick and easy. The ramps can be cut for various heights and notched for door jams and stops using a jig saw, or a utility knife. They can be temporarily or permanently installed. SafePath has manufactured the EZEdge ramps from the highest quality materials available and designed them to exceed specifications for safety, slip resistance, easy access and code compliance. All EZEdge products are proudly made in the U.S.A. Enjoy!.
feature_bullets: Extremely durable for long service life
